answers.answer: How much water do you drink per day?

question: Hi, I was wondering if you could answer my question. I have been having bad pains in my hands for over five years now in my hands starting when I was pregnant with my first child. I was 18 at the time and was told by my Ob/gyn that it was just from being pregnant and retaining water. Now I am 25 and it still has not gone away. I comes back ever so often. It seems like it's been more often lately. My hands swell up either in little areas or the whole hand. I  really don't know what to do. I don't get any answers just googling swollen hands so this is the first time I'm posting a question. I am hoping you can help me. My family has a history with high blood pressure, in which i do not have, cancer, high cholesterol, heart disease, diabetes, asthma, bronchitis, and thyroid problems as far as I know. I know, I know, it's a lot but i cant handle the throbbing pain sometimes. Thank you bunches.
title: My whole hands swell up and hurt and ache.
